text: Echo is the second studio album by English singer Leona Lewis. It was released in November 2009 by Syco. ==Information== The music on Echo is a mixture of Europop and R&B.; It also has a Cover version of the Oasis song "Stop Crying Your Heart Out" Two singles were released from the album. One of them was the R&B; ballad "Happy". The album also features a duet with American pop rock group OneRepublic called "Lost Then Found". ==Reviews== Echo met mixed to favourable reviews by critics. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2009 albums Category:Leona Lewis albums Category:Pop albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Echo (Leona Lewis album)
